titles.title: I wanna be close close to your side

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I wanna be close close to your side
Heaven is real and death is a lie
I wanna hear voices of angels above
Singing as one

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah Holy Holy
God almighty Great I am
Who is worthy
None beside Thee
God Almighty
Great I Am

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I wanna be near near to your heart
Loving the world hating the dark
I want to see dry bones living again
Singing as one

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
The mountains shake before Him
The demons run and flee
At the mention of the name
King of Majesty
There is no power in hell
Or any who can stand
Before the power and the presence of the Great I am
The Great I am The Great I am
The Great I am The Great I am The Great I am
